snippet.title: The Isle Tide Hotel - Steam Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2000090/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=reveal

An absent father must rescue his teenage daughter from an eclectic cult before their final night at the Isle Tide Hotel. Players investigate the strange events that unfold to save Eleanor Malone in this live-action interactive mystery game, where every decision affects the story.  

The Isle Tide Hotel is a live-action interactive mystery, where every decision effects the story and the multiple ending paths. Coming to PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, iOS and Android in August 2023.

Developed by Interflix Media and Wales Interactive.
Published by Wales Interactive.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/WalesInter
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WalesInteractive
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/walesinteractive
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/WalesInteractive
Wales Interactive: https://www.walesinteractive.com

#FMV #InteractiveMovie #InterflixMedia
